title: Study Hall: THE BILLION DOLLAR BUSINESS OF POLICE BRUTALITY & SOCIALLY RESPONSIBLE INVESTING
itunes:title: Study Hall: THE BILLION DOLLAR BUSINESS OF POLICE BRUTALITY & SOCIALLY RESPONSIBLE INVESTING
description:
In this Study Hall we discussed the business of police brutality, the economic play behind it that benefits investment firms and large banks, economic strategies and solutions that can be implemented to help solve this age-old problem.

We also discussed socially conscious investing and ways to invest in funds that align with your social, religious, and political beliefs. We also went into private prison stocks and examined how you might be invested in prison companies without even knowing it.

EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com 

Link for Invest Fest Europe: https://investfest.com/euro/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
